meanings.definition: Super - very good or pleasant; excellent
meanings.sent2: She did a supers job on her school project.
meanings.sent3: The supers sunny day made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was supers, like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The supers sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Super - a person who is in charge of a group of workers
meanings.sent1: The supers at the construction site directed the workers.
meanings.sent2: The school principal is a supers who leads the teachers.
meanings.sent3: The supers joked with the workers to keep morale high.
meanings.sent4: She was a supers, guiding her team like a captain.
meanings.sent5: The supers organized the team with precision and care.

meanings.definition: Super - a prefix meaning above, over, beyond, or greater than
meanings.sent1: The superhero had supers human strength.
meanings.sent2: The airplane flew at supers sonic speed.
meanings.sent3: The supers ambitious goal motivated the team.
meanings.sent4: His intelligence was supers, surpassing all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The supers highway connected cities in record time.
